short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for filtering jobs feeds by blacklisting text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add any text to your blacklist at the extension settings.
Every time a compatible page's list loads or updates, the extension will delete any listing which includes any blacklisted text.

Currently compatible with: LinkedIn, Indeed, Wellfound

If you're experiencing any bug/issue or think an important feature is needed, I'd appreciate if you let me know before submitting a review! I'll usually respond within a day: https://github.com/EvAvKein/FilterJobsFeeds/issues/new
